jodd.madvoc.component

Class ScopeResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.component.ScopeResolver

  • public class ScopeResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Scope resolver maintains scope instances and provides lookups.

      • defaultOrScopeType

        public <S extends MadvocScope> S defaultOrScopeType(java.lang.Class<S> scopeClass)
        Lookups the scope instance of given scope annotation. If instance does not exist, it will be created, cached and returned.
